# convert(_:to:)

**Instance Method**

Converts a point from view space to page space.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func convert(_ point: CGPoint, to page: PDFPage) -> CGPoint
```

```swift
@MainActor func convert(_ point: NSPoint, to page: PDFPage) -> NSPoint
```

## Discussion

Page space is a 72 dpi coordinate system with the origin at the lower-left corner of the current page. View space is a coordinate system with the origin at the lower-left corner of the current PDF view.

## Converting Page and View Points

- **page(for:nearest:)**: Returns the page containing a point specified in view coordinates.
- **convert(_:to:)**: Converts a rectangle from view space to page space.
- **convert(_:from:)**: Converts a point from page space to view space.
- **convert(_:from:)**: Converts a rectangle from page space to view space.
